General.Name: STG International Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: STG International Ltd. operates as a reseller of electronic components, equipment, and systems in Israel. The company offers embedded, connectivity, power, RF and passive, imaging and motion, cooling, and other systems. It serves defense, communication, security, medical, industrial, and semiconductor sectors. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Givatayim, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Shoshana  Berkowitz
1.Title: Deputy CEO, Chief Financial & Admin. Officer and Corp. Sec.

2.Name: Mr. Eyal  Wilf
2.Title: Joint Deputy CEO & Bus. Devel. Mang.
